OOC: I know perfectly well that Necromancer's dragon mode is gigantic.  I'll 
just have to use it to my advantage...

:::Starscream:::

::Starscream sees Megaton flying right toward him.  Well, if this bot wanted 
a dogfight, hed get it.  Starscream fires a missle into Megaton's mouth and 
does a U-turn to escape from getting swallowed::

--part1_bf.9d6343a.276e3759_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<BR>

<BR>
<BR>::Starscream sees Megaton flying right toward him.  Well, if this bot wanted <BR>a dogfight, hed get it.  Starscream fires a missle into Megaton's mouth and <BR>does a U-turn to escape from getting swallowed::</FONT></HTML>
